attributes.value: Sees guile and cunning as indirect and somewhat worthless
Disregards tradition
Finds the ideas of independence and freedom somewhat foolish
Finds the pursuit of skill mastery off-putting
Respects perseverance
Finds leisure time wasteful
Finds the pursuit of knowledge to be a waste of effort
Is not the type to fall in love or even develop positive feelings
Often feels envious of others
Is quite polite
Is extremely confident of herself in situations requiring her skills
Presents herself modestly and frowns on any flashy accoutrements
Is a pessimist
Is generally unhindered by the thoughts of others concerning her actions
Shares intimate details of life without sparing a thought to repercussions or propriety
Dislikes helping others
Can get caught up in internal deliberations when action is necessary
Slow to tire
Meager creativity
A sum of patience
A way with words
A good feel for social relationships
